markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Web Weaver](/Feats.aspx?ID=2767) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can produce a soft silk to weave into useful items. You gain the [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844) feat with a specialty in weaving. You can use your webbing to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) simple, nonconsumable threaded items, such as clothing and rope, at zero cost as long as their base Price is 1 sp or less. These items have no resale value, and they naturally degrade after 24 hours without regular (if minor) maintenance. You can maintain up to 10 such items at a time; if you create a new one, your oldest creation breaks down from neglect. These temporary items take you only 1 day to Craft instead of 4. If you're an expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4), you can Craft these items in 1 hour; if you're a master, you can Craft them in 10 minutes; if you're legendary, you can Craft them in 1 minute.
name: Web Weaver
